00043 void DateAndTime::Set()
00044 {
00045     struct timeval CurrentTimeOfDay;
00046 
00047     // retrieve the current time
00048     gettimeofday(&CurrentTimeOfDay, NULL);
00049 
00050     // Set current time
00051     Set(CurrentTimeOfDay);
00052 }
00053 
00055 void DateAndTime::Set(time_t TimeToSet)
00056 {
00057     time_t LocaltimetoSet = TimeToSet;
00058     struct tm * SpittedTime = localtime((const time_t*)&LocaltimetoSet);
00059 
00060     Milliseconds = 0;                                   /* milliseconds */
00061     Seconds = SpittedTime->tm_sec;              /* seconds */
00062     Minutes = SpittedTime->tm_min;              /* minutes */
00063     Hours =SpittedTime->tm_hour;                /* hours */
00064     Day = SpittedTime->tm_mday;                 /* day of the month */
00065     Month = SpittedTime->tm_mon+1;              /* month */
00066     Year = SpittedTime->tm_year+1900;   /* year */
00067 }
00068 
00070 void DateAndTime::Set(struct timeval& TimeToSet)
00071 {
00072     time_t LocaltimetoSet = TimeToSet.tv_sec;
00073     struct tm * SpittedTime = localtime((const time_t*)&LocaltimetoSet);
00074 
00075     Milliseconds = TimeToSet.tv_usec/1000;      /* milliseconds */
00076     Seconds = SpittedTime->tm_sec;                      /* seconds */
00077     Minutes = SpittedTime->tm_min;                      /* minutes */
00078     Hours =SpittedTime->tm_hour;                        /* hours */
00079     Day = SpittedTime->tm_mday;                         /* day of the month */
00080     Month = SpittedTime->tm_mon+1;                      /* month */
00081     Year = SpittedTime->tm_year+1900;           /* year */
00082 }
00083 
00085 void DateAndTime::Set(struct timeval* TimeToSet)
00086 {
00087     time_t LocaltimetoSet = TimeToSet->tv_sec;
00088     struct tm * SpittedTime = localtime((const time_t*)&LocaltimetoSet);
00089 
00090     Milliseconds = TimeToSet->tv_usec/1000;     /* milliseconds */
00091     Seconds = SpittedTime->tm_sec;                      /* seconds */
00092     Minutes = SpittedTime->tm_min;                      /* minutes */
00093     Hours =SpittedTime->tm_hour;                        /* hours */
00094     Day = SpittedTime->tm_mday;                         /* day of the month */
00095     Month = SpittedTime->tm_mon+1;                      /* month */
00096     Year = SpittedTime->tm_year+1900;           /* year */
00097 }
